Analyses involve pre-post comparison outcome across study arm , test hypothesis 6 week , daily , dyadic exercise intervention result great improvement psychological distress individual intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: The propose randomized control trial aim recruit 70 lesbian , gay , bisexual , transgender ( LGBT ) cancer survivor complete treatment ( surgery , radiation , chemotherapy ) within past 24 month , final , evaluable sample 60 LGBT survivor attrition . The propose RCT also recruit caregiver ( broadly define ) cancer survivor . Each recruit cancer survivor ask name person feel provide care ( emotional , informational , tangible , etc . ) cancer experience , stricture place relationship term type duration . The caregiver approach participate RCT . Thus sample consist 70 LGBT survivor ( 60 evaluable ) caregiver ( 140 individual total/120 evaluable ) . Recruitment primary analysis specifically target LGBT cancer survivor . All data gather participant 21 year age old . Participants cancer survivor complete treatment caregiver cancer survivor ; survivor caregiver able read understand English .
DOC.criteria: ( Survivors ) : To include study , cancer survivor must : Have diagnosis cancer ( cancer type exclude squamous basal cell [ skin cancer ] ) complete primary surgery , chemotherapy , and/or radiation ( continued adjuvant treatment still eligible ) , Identify lesbian , gay , bisexual , transgender , samesex romantic partner , Have caregiver willing participate study ( define anyone provide emotional support tangible assistance survivor ' cancer experience ) , Be able read English , Be 21 year age old , Give write informed consent . ( Caregivers ) : Caregivers must : Be nominate cancer survivor , Be able read English , Be 21 year age old , Give write informed consent . Have physical limitation ( e.g. , cardiorespiratory , orthopedic ) contraindicate participate low moderateintensity homebased walk progressive resistance program physical function testing , assess medical oncologist , primary care physician , and/or study medical monitor ( three physician ' designees ) , For caregiver , currently undergo active treatment cancer .
